item.title: Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @Zameix Zameix
item.description:
@Zameix wrote:

client.java:29972: illegal start of expression
public int GetCLMagic(int ItemID) {
^
1 error
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

Here is where it is messed up:

[code] }
String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID);
if (ItemName.startsWith(“Granite”)) {
return 50;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Torags hammers”) || ItemName.endsWith(“Dharoks greataxe”)) {
return 70;
}

	}
public int GetCLMagic(int ItemID) {
	if (ItemID == -1) {
		return 1;
	}
	String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID);
	if (ItemName.startsWith("Ahrim")) {
		return 70;
	}

}
public int GetCLRanged(int ItemID) {
	if (ItemID == 7629) {
		return 99;
}

	String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID);
	if (ItemName.startsWith("Karil")) {
		return 70;
	}
	if (ItemName.startsWith("Crystal")) {
		return 90;
	}[/code]

Somwhere in there. Can someone edit or point me in the right direction of what’s up please?

Read full topic
